titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of the Community Development Block Grant program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

term.name: Urban and suburban affairs and development

bill.summary:
7/11/2014--Introduced. Supports the goals and ideals of the Community Development Block Grant (CDBG) program, now in its 40th year of continuous service.
Recognizes the benefits the CDBG program has provided to urban, suburban, and rural communities.
Acknowledges the importance of this federal grant program to states and local communities throughout the United States.
